Body:
with pytest.raises(argparse.ArgumentTypeError) as e:
    formula_type(ascii_lowercase)
assert str(e.value) == """~~test error~~
       ~~rendered~~
           ^"""
mock.patch('cubelang.cli.options.parse_actions', side_effect=ParsingError(
    '~~test error~~', 10))mock.patch('cubelang.cli.options.truncate_string_around', return_value=(
    '~~rendered~~', 4))
